greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in expansion of Eisenstein series -q*E'_2.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000

M. Kaneko and D. Zagier, Supersingular j-invariants, hypergeometric series and Atkin's orthogonal polynomials, pp. 97-126 of D. A. Buell and J. T. Teitelbaum, eds., Computational Perspectives on Number Theory, Amer. Math. Soc., 1998.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Eisenstein Series
formula: G.f.: 24*x*f'(x), where f(x) = Sum_{k>=1} k*x^k/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 31 2017
maple: with(numtheory); E:=proc(k) series(1-(2*k/bernoulli(k))*add( sigma[k-1](n)*q^n, n=1..60),q,61); end; -diff(E(2),q);
mathematica: -(E2[x]^2 - E4[x])/12 + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& // Rest (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 23 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2009
